posts.post_content:
Hello All,

Due to my recent success of finding a few low-mid grade rare backs that I purchased from a b/s/t post, I thought I would try it again. I am looking for low and possibly midgrade grade hindu, carolina brights, lenox, uzit, drum, factory 42 piedmont, and broad leaf backs with common and HOF players on the front. Please e-mail me if you have any for sale.

Thanks,
Lee
I have a Bernhard SL low graded raw with Hindu back. Would like to trade for SL T206 I don't have or a better Bernhard. Email me if interested. D.   [url]broughman@comcast.net[/url]
I have had lots of replies on the Bernhard Hindu back card. It is on hold right now and in poor condition. Will post if any change. Thanks D.

Thanks for the reply, but I have owned that very card in the past and do not want it back.

Lee
